How It Works

Three simple steps to protect your family's future with trusted legal protection

Create Your Will

Answer simple questions about your family and assets. Our system helps you create a legal will that follows Kenyan law. No complicated forms or legal jargon - just clear, simple steps.

Learn more

Secure Forever

Your documents are protected using blockchain technology that makes them tamper-proof. Multiple security layers ensure your family can always trust what you've created.

Learn more

Share with Family

Trusted family members can access your documents when needed. Our secure sharing system ensures only authorized people can view your important information.

Learn more

Web3 Will & Trust Platform

Blockchain-Secured Legal Services

Create legally binding wills and trusts with blockchain technology. Our web3 platform makes your will's data immutable and prevents forgery through decentralized verification.

Blockchain-secured creation
Our platform uses web3 technology to create immutable wills, with every action logged on the blockchain.
Verified law firms
Connect with our network of verified, experienced law firms for professional notarization services.
Immutable records
All document changes are permanently recorded on the blockchain, preventing forgery and tampering.
Legal compliance
All wills and trusts are created to meet local legal requirements with blockchain verification.

From basic wills to comprehensive trust services - secure your legacy today

Free Will

Basic will creation with blockchain security

Free

  • Basic will template
  • Up to 5 assets
  • Blockchain verification
  • Email support
  • Digital download

Verified Will

Professional notarization with immutable blockchain records

KES 15,000one-time

  • Everything in Free Will
  • Legal review by qualified attorneys
  • Notarization service
  • Unlimited assets
  • Immutable blockchain storage
  • Anti-forgery protection
  • Priority support
  • Legal compliance guarantee

Trust

Complete trust setup with blockchain-secured asset protection

KES 50,000one-time

  • Everything in Verified Will
  • Trust establishment
  • Asset protection planning
  • Tax optimization guidance
  • Blockchain-secured trust records
  • Immutable beneficiary tracking
  • Ongoing trust management
  • Dedicated legal advisor
